name: Mr Giggle XMass 2 Lite
description:
WELCOME TO XMASS - ONE OF THE MOST ADDICTIVE BOARD/PUZZLE GAME !!!
Xmass is a very fun and addictive game that plays well on iPod touch, iPhone & iPad.

SHAKE IT
Using this function you can get rid of your big enemies - the Villains. Use it carefully because it costs half of the level-time.

NEW DESIGN
You will fall in love with our new design, full of Christmas atmosphere.

GAME CENTER SUPPORT
Use Apple's Game Center network to store your records and compare yourself with players from all over the world.

MULTITASKING SUPPORT
Switch between your favorite apps instantly on iOS4 multitasking compatible devices.

SKIP INTRO
If you are an expert, select the "Skip intro" option in the settings to start the game faster.

LEARN THE RULES IN 20 SECONDS
In order to allow you to enjoy the game as soon as possible, we added a short introduction which explains all main rules.

MAKE WELL-KNOWN SHAPES AND SCORE
Move column or row to build shape in one colour.

MORE FIGURES - MORE POINTS
Be expert and match a few shapes in ONE move - you get more points.

BE AWARE OF DEVIL
Villain is the only block, which cannot be use to match the figure. Set up figure with Angels to kill villains.

EXTRA BONUS WITH SANTA
Set up figure with SANTA to get Extra Bonus.

THREE DIFFERENT MODES
If you're a novice play long mode. If you feel you're an expert choose short mode.

LIFEBUOY
If you can't match any shape you'll see an adviser. Note - do not wait for it too often because your time is limited.

DOUBLE TOUCH FOR PAUSE
Double tap the screen to pause game.

EVERY GAME MORE ADDICTIVE
You'll find out that every game is more and more addictive. This is what I love about this game. I can play hours and never get bored!

INSERT COIN TO CONTINUE
If the time is over you can decide to continue your game by using virtual coin.
